#summary jsCore QuotedVars property.
#labels Phase-Implementation

*syntax:*

{{{
object.QuotedVars ' [Boolean]
}}}

JSON string have a quoted variables for json objects. Many difference EcmaScript compliant engine have a difference specifications. For example ActionScript. ActionScript fails process for quoted variables.

== Samples ==

{{{
<!--#include file="JSON_latest.asp"-->
<%
Dim car
Set car = jsObject()

car("model") = 1984
car("color") = "red"
car("name") = "anadol"

car.Flush

car.QuotedVars = False
car.Flush
%>
}}}
